title: Official Arizona State Travel Guide | Visit Arizona
text: Official State Travel Guide Plan your Arizona vacation with the Official State Travel Guide – available in print, electronically, or both. Please take a minute to subscribe and we will keep you posted on all the exciting news and events taking place in our area! The free travel packet includes an Arizona Official State Travel Guide and a full-sized Arizona state map. International visitors may download digital brochures in the following languages: Español, Deutsche, Français, 日本語, Chinese, UK/English, Korean. Travel packets may take 7-10 days to be delivered to US destinations. Allow 2-3 weeks delivery time for international shipments. Please note that VisitArizona.com respects your privacy and will not share or sell your information to any third parties. If you have questions on traveling within Arizona, please contact one of our friendly and knowledgeable travel counselors at 602-364-3700.
